page.title: 07Employment trends.
page.content: {Unemployment}is approx{18%}of the workforce.{13%}of the workforce is {self }-{employed}mainly in service and building jobs. Within the employed workforce,{56% of} {women}employed{have local jobs}in Irlam and Cadishead.Mostly jobs are in shops,supermarkets and public services. {Male employment is only 31% in the } {local area.}Many labour intensive industries have been replaced by new light industry requiring fewer shop floor workers.Local industry prefers a local workforce ,especially for shift work. For employment,males in particular have to look towards,{Trafford } {Park,Salford,Eccles,Warrington}and {Manchester.}Even for{Y.T.S. schemes}it means travelling into{Eccles}or {Salford}for most{young people. }
